name: TYCOON!!!
description:
A game for WeeklyGameJam#163 with the theme "Tycoon".

It's the time to become a TYCOON!

Carefully move your pile of money using "A, D". 

Make investments using  "S". When the time comes, the money will double!

But if no money is on your hand, you will be broke.

And be aware of the red laser, it might take away your money.

Good luck!

Composer: Benjamin Tissot (Bensound)
